result.reason: Verified ObjectDisposedException crash when closing SSH connection window — protocol fires Prot_Event_Closed after ConnectionWindow is already disposed, causing unhandled exception that terminates the app.
result.approach: In Prot_Event_Closed, add IsDisposed/Disposing guard before Control.Invoke so the callback is silently ignored if the window was already disposed during closure.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Verified ObjectDisposedException crash when closing SSH connection window — protocol fires Prot_Event_Closed after ConnectionWindow is already disposed, causing unhandled exception that terminates the app.","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs"],"approach":"In Prot_Event_Closed, add IsDisposed/Disposing guard before Control.Invoke so the callback is silently ignored if the window was already disposed during closure."}
